Iranian Delegation Arrives

articles.title: Iranian Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Chairman of DPRK SPA Meets Delegation of Physical Education Organisation of Iran 
   Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met the delegation of the Physical Education Organisation of Iran led by Head Mohammad Ali Abadi, vice-president of Iran who paid a courtesy call upon him, and had a friendly talk with the delegation at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
